Poland: Signing of the Treaty of Żurawno concludes the Polish–Ottoman War
Russia: Russo-Turkish War (1676–1681): The Ottoman army joined Doroshenko's forces in an attack on the Left-bank city of Chyhyryn.
Alexis died. His son Feodor III became tsar.
Sweden: The Battle of Halmstad takes place.
The Battle of Lund takes place.
USA: Bacon's Rebellion: The rebellion, in Virginia, took place.
King Philip's War: The war took place.
